FuncDef: This command configures a TCA for the counter capturing drops due to basic GTP header sanity checks, such as validating that the GTP-U version is 1 and that the protocol bit is set to 1 for UDP traffic destined to port 2152. A GTP sanity drop TCA can be created for traffic generated from the subscriber side of AA (from-sub) or for traffic generated from the network toward the AA subscriber (to-sub). Thecreatekeyword is mandatory when creating a default action TCA.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the traffic direction. Values-from-sub, to-sub.
Keyword used to create the TCA.
